ONLY for generator label or field

Management GRID enter = select 1..n 0 = abort (Escape) Turning on the mouse UP DOWn PageUP PageDown Automatic alignment based on the type referencetraiement des menus enter = select 1..n 0 = abort (Escape) Turning on the mouse UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT movement width the wheel and validation width the clikInput buffer management modeled on 5250/3270 inspiration ncurse application hold principe and new langage use termkey.nim

Format management including zones keyboard proction keys are returned to the calling procedure

only the key CtrlH = Aide / Help for field

Reserved keys for FIELD management traditionally UP, DOWN, TAB, STAB, CtrlA, ENTER, HOME, END, RIGTH, LEFt, BACKSPACE, DELETE, INSERT CALL , ATTN , PROC predefined and customizable REGEX control

Format management including zones keyboard proction keys are returned to the calling procedure

only the key CtrlH = Aide / Help for field

Reserved keys for FIELD management traditionally UP, DOWN, TAB, STAB, CtrlA, ENTER, HOME, END, RIGTH, LEFt, BACKSPACE, DELETE, INSERT CALL , ATTN , PROC predefined and customizable REGEX control

Types

BOX = object
  name: string
  posx: Natural
  posy: Natural
  lines: Natural
  cols: Natural
  cadre: CADRE
  style: set[Style]
  backgr: BackgroundColor
  backbr: bool
  foregr: ForegroundColor
  forebr: bool
  title*: string
  titlebackgr: BackgroundColor
  titlebackbr: bool
  titleforegr: ForegroundColor
  titleforebr: bool
  titlestyle: set[Style]
  actif: bool

BOXATRB = ref object
  style*: set[Style]
  backgr*: BackgroundColor
  backbr*: bool
  foregr*: ForegroundColor
  forebr*: bool
  title_style*: set[Style]
  title_backgr*: BackgroundColor
  title_backbr*: bool
  title_foregr*: ForegroundColor
  title_forebr*: bool

BTNSPACE = ref object
  space*: Natural

BUTTON = object
  key: TKey
  text: string
  ctrl: bool
  actif: bool

CADRE {.pure.} = enum
  line0, line1, line2
CELL = object
  text: string
  long: Natural
  reftyp: REFTYP
  posy: Natural
  edtcar: string
  cellatr: CELLATRB

CELLATRB = ref object
  cell_style*: set[Style]
  cell_backgr*: BackgroundColor
  cell_backbr*: bool
  cell_foregr*: ForegroundColor
  cell_forebr*: bool

FIELD = object
  name: string
  posx: Natural
  posy: Natural
  style: set[Style]
  backgr: BackgroundColor
  backbr: bool
  foregr: ForegroundColor
  forebr: bool
  pstyle: set[Style]
  pbackgr: BackgroundColor
  pbackbr: bool
  pforegr: ForegroundColor
  pforebr: bool
  reftyp: REFTYP
  width: Natural
  scal: Natural
  nbrcar: Natural
  empty: bool
  protect: bool
  pading: bool
  edtcar: string
  regex: string
  errmsg: string
  help: string
  text*: string
  switch*: bool
  process: string
  err: bool
  actif*: bool

GRIDATRB = ref object
  style*: set[Style]
  backgr*: BackgroundColor
  backbr*: bool
  foregr*: ForegroundColor
  forebr*: bool
  title_style*: set[Style]
  title_backgr*: BackgroundColor
  title_backbr*: bool
  title_foregr*: ForegroundColor
  title_forebr*: bool

GRIDSFL = ref object
  name: string
  posx: Natural
  posy: Natural
  lines: Natural
  cols: Natural
  pagerows: Natural
  rows: seq[seq[string]]
  nrow: seq[int]
  headers: seq[CELL]
  separator: GridStyle
  gridatr: GRIDATRB
  actif: bool
  lignes: int
  pages: int
  cursligne: int
  curspage: int
  buf: seq[TerminalChar]

GridStyle = object
  colSeparator*: string

HIDEN = object
  name: string
  reftyp: REFTYP
  text*: string
  switch*: bool

LABEL = object
  name: string
  posx: Natural
  posy: Natural
  style: set[Style]
  backgr: BackgroundColor
  backbr: bool
  foregr: ForegroundColor
  forebr: bool
  text*: string
  title: bool
  actif: bool

MENU = ref object
  name: string
  posx: Natural
  posy: Natural
  lines: Natural
  cols: Natural
  cadre: CADRE
  mnuvh: MNUVH
  style: set[Style]
  styleBar: set[Style]
  styleCell: set[Style]
  backgr: BackgroundColor
  backbr: bool
  foregr: ForegroundColor
  forebr: bool
  item: seq[string]
  selMenu: Natural
  actif: bool

MNUATRB = ref object
  style*: set[Style]
  backgr*: BackgroundColor
  backbr*: bool
  foregr*: ForegroundColor
  forebr*: bool
  styleBar*: set[Style]
  styleCell*: set[Style]

MNUVH {.pure.} = enum
  vertical = 0, horizontal
PANEL = ref object
  name: string
  posx: Natural
  posy: Natural
  lines: Natural
  cols: Natural
  backgr*: BackgroundColor
  backbr*: bool
  foregr*: ForegroundColor
  forebr*: bool
  style*: set[Style]
  cadre: CADRE
  boxpnl: BOX
  cbox*: seq[BOX]
  label*: seq[LABEL]
  field*: seq[FIELD]
  hiden*: seq[HIDEN]
  button*: seq[BUTTON]
  index: Natural
  funcKey: seq[TKey]
  mouse: bool
  buf: seq[TerminalChar]
  actif: bool

REFTYP {.pure.} = enum
  TEXT_FREE, ALPHA, ALPHA_UPPER, ALPHA_NUMERIC, ALPHA_NUMERIC_UPPER, TEXT_FULL,
  PASSWORD, DIGIT, DIGIT_SIGNED, DECIMAL, DECIMAL_SIGNED, DATE_ISO, DATE_FR,
  DATE_US, TELEPHONE, MAIL_ISO, YES_NO, SWITCH, FPROC, FCALL
TerminalChar = object
  ch: Rune
  bg: BackgroundColor
  bgb: bool
  fg: ForegroundColor
  fgb: bool
  style: set[Style]
  on: bool

TKey_Grid {.pure.} = enum
  PGUp, PGDown, PGHome, PGEnd
ZONATRB = ref object
  style*: set[Style]
  backgr*: BackgroundColor
  backbr*: bool
  foregr*: ForegroundColor
  forebr*: bool
